question: iam having blood spotting not regular periods it is dark brown spotting once a day then again starts
answer:
QUESTION
what rulings for taking bath & offer prayers & about intercourse .
ANSWER


Share:
Any discharge other than a white or colourless discharge - irrespective of
the quantity - is regarded as a normal discharge of blood. Hence, you should
treat such spotting just as you would treat your Haydh. Therefore, Salaat,
intercourse, etc. is prohibited in this case.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
